item.title: 中国的圣诞节充满了闪闪发光的装饰和外国影响的担忧
item.description: Giant Christmas trees adorned with lights, tinsel and gift boxes greet shoppers at glittering malls in big Chinese cities like Shanghai and Chongqing, but in many parts of China, extending season's greetings is out of the question.翻译:在上海和重庆等中国大城市，巨大的圣诞树装饰着灯光、金属丝和礼品盒，迎接购物者，但在中国的许多地方，延长节日的问候是不可能的。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国官方媒体：菲律宾在南海的行动“极其危险”
item.description: Chinese state media accused the Philippines on Monday of repeatedly infringing on China's territory in the South China Sea, spreading false information and colluding with extraterritorial forces to cause trouble.翻译:中国官方媒体周一指责菲律宾多次侵犯中国在南海的领土、散布虚假信息并勾结域外势力滋事。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国地震死亡人数上升至149人，一周后仍有两人失踪
item.description: One of China's most powerful earthquakes in recent years straddled the Gansu and Qinghai provinces in an area where many of China's Hui people, a tight-knit ethnic minority, are found.翻译:中国近年来最强烈的地震之一横跨甘肃省和青海省，该地区居住着许多中国回族（一个紧密团结的少数民族）。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 北京打破七十年来的寒冷天气记录
item.description: Some areas in the northeast hit -40 degrees Celsius and Fahrenheit as biting cold air flowed from the Arctic. A Beijing observatory recorded more than 300 hours of below-freezing temperatures since Dec. 11.翻译:由于来自北极的刺骨冷空气，东北部部分地区气温达到-40摄氏度和华氏度。自12月11日以来，北京气象台记录了超过300小时的零下气温。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 印尼镍冶炼炉火灾造成13名工人死亡、46人受伤
item.description: Thirteen workers were killed and 46 injured on Sunday in a fire at a nickel smelter furnace owned by Indonesia Tsingshan Stainless Steel (ITSS) on Sulawesi island, the owner of the industrial park where the smelter is located said.翻译:印度尼西亚青山不锈钢公司（ITSS）位于苏拉威西岛的镍冶炼厂所在工业园业主表示，周日，该公司旗下镍冶炼炉发生火灾，造成 13 名工人死亡、46 人受伤。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 阿洛西离开布里斯班狮吼寻求“海外机会”
item.description: Brisbane Roar announced the departure of Ross Aloisi from the role of head coach on Sunday, saying the former midfielder has left the club to take on an "overseas opportunity".翻译:布里斯班狮吼周日宣布罗斯·阿洛伊西辞去主教练一职，称这位前中场球员已离开俱乐部去寻找“海外机会”。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 台湾称八架中国战斗机越过海峡中线
item.description: Taiwan's defence ministry said on Sunday that over the previous 24 hours it had detected eight Chinese fighter jets crossing over the median line of the Taiwan Strait, as well as one Chinese balloon.翻译:台湾国防部周日表示，在过去的 24 小时内，它发现了 8 架中国战斗机以及 1 个中国气球飞越台湾海峡中线。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 消息人士称，印度逮捕了中国公司 Vivo 的两名高级员工
item.description: India's financial crime-fighting agency has arrested two senior employees working for Chinese smartphone maker Vivo's India unit, a source directly involved with the case said on Saturday, which the company vowed to challenge legally.翻译:周六，一名直接参与此案的消息人士称，印度打击金融犯罪机构逮捕了中国智能手机制造商 Vivo 印度子公司的两名高级员工，该公司誓言要对这起案件提起法律诉讼。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 随着选举临近，台湾报道更多中国军事活动
item.description: Taiwan reported Chinese warplanes and warships around the island on Saturday, including aircraft crossing the sensitive median line of the Taiwan Strait, as Beijing continues military activities with three weeks to go before Taiwan votes.翻译:台湾周六报道称，中国战机和军舰在台湾周围飞行，其中包括飞机穿越台湾海峡敏感的中线，距离台湾投票还有三周时间，北京仍在继续军事活动。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国确定1400亿美元支出计划中的第二批项目
item.description: China's top planning body said on Saturday it had identified a second batch of public investment projects, including flood control and disaster relief programmes, under a bond issuance and investment plan announced in October to boost the economy.翻译:中国最高规划机构周六表示，根据10月份宣布的旨在提振经济的债券发行和投资计划，已确定了第二批公共投资项目，包括防洪和救灾项目。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 安哥拉退出欧佩克为更多中国投资开辟道路
item.description: Angola, for which oil constitutes 90% of exports, is seeking to diversify its economy, but it also needs revenue. "China stands out as a pivotal and proven partner," its foreign minister had said.翻译:石油占安哥拉出口的 90%，该国正在寻求经济多元化，但也需要收入。 “中国是一个举足轻重且经过验证的合作伙伴，”其外交部长表示。
item.author: Joe Cash

item.title: 台湾副总统领跑者表示，我们不会让与中国发生战争
item.description: Taiwan's ruling party will not let war break out with China, but it is China that is to blame for stirring up tensions, Taipei's former top diplomat in the United States and now frontrunner to become its next vice president, said on Friday.翻译:台北前驻美国最高外交官、现任台湾下一任副总统的领跑者周五表示，台湾执政党不会让与中国爆发战争，但挑起紧张局势的罪魁祸首是中国。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 土地所有者投诉后，中国公司被禁止瓦努阿图原木出口
item.description: A Chinese company began logging in Vanuatu during recent political turmoil, residents said, raising concern over the environment and workers in military uniforms in a Pacific Island nation where Beijing and Washington vie for influence.翻译:当地居民表示，在最近的政治动荡期间，一家中国公司开始在瓦努阿图进行伐木活动，这引起了人们对这个太平洋岛国的环境和穿着军装的工人的担忧，而北京和华盛顿正在争夺这个太平洋岛国的影响力。
item.author: Kirsty Needham

item.title: 中国宣布减少视频游戏支出的规定
item.description: Chinese regulators announced on Friday a wide range of rules aimed at curbing spending and rewards that encourage video games, dealing a blow to the world's biggest games market, which returned to growth this year.翻译:中国监管机构周五宣布了一系列旨在限制鼓励电子游戏的支出和奖励的规定，这对今年恢复增长的全球最大游戏市场造成了打击。
item.author: Josh Ye

item.title: 随着中国气温攀升，刺骨的寒冷放松了控制
item.description: After almost two weeks of below-freezing weather brought by a cold wave that swept through most of China, a round of warm air will begin to flow from the country's north to south lifting temperatures from the weekend.翻译:寒潮席卷中国大部分地区，带来近两周零度以下的天气，从周末开始，一轮暖空气将开始从中国北部向南部流动，气温将升高。
item.author: Liz Lee

item.title: 香港法院拒绝撤销黎智英煽动叛乱罪指控
item.description: A Hong Kong court on Friday rejected a bid by the legal team for pro-democracy tycoon Jimmy Lai to have sedition charge against him dropped.翻译:周五，香港一家法院驳回了法律团队要求撤销对民主大亨黎智英煽动叛乱指控的请求。
item.author: Jessie Pang, Dorothy Kam

item.title: 中国解除对台湾石斑鱼的进口禁令，胡萝卜加大棒外交
item.description: China will resume importing grouper fish from Taiwan from Friday, the Chinese government announced, a day after angering Taipei with the ending of tariff cuts on some chemical imports less than a month before Taiwanese elections.翻译:中国政府宣布，中国将从周五起恢复从台湾进口石斑鱼。一天前，距离台湾大选不到一个月，中国政府终止了对部分化学品进口的关税削减，激怒了台北。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中美气候关系为美国大选和特使更换做好准备
item.description: The U.S. and China have delivered big wins in climate diplomacy through the unique relationship of their chief climate envoys, but the two countries are bracing for change as the Chinese envoy retires and the U.S. readies for an election.翻译:美国和中国通过首席气候特使的独特关系在气候外交上取得了巨大胜利，但随着中国特使退休和美国准备大选，两国正在为变革做好准备。
item.author: Valerie Volcovici, David Stanway

item.title: 中美高级军事官员一年多来首次讲话
item.description: U.S. officials hope the meeting could lead to a broader restoration of ties between the two militaries.翻译:美国官员希望这次会议能够促成两国军队之间更广泛的关系恢复。
item.author: Phil Stewart, Doina Chiacu

item.title: 中国以国家安全为由禁止出口稀土加工技术
item.description: China, the world's top processor of rare earths, banned the export of technology to make rare earth magnets on Thursday, adding it to a ban already in place on technology to extract and separate the critical materials.翻译:作为世界最大的稀土加工国，中国周四禁止出口稀土磁体制造技术，这是对提取和分离关键材料的技术实施的禁令之一。
item.author: Siyi Liu, Dominique Patton
